title: AuraFit
description: AuraFit is a complete fitness tracking and trainer booking platform designed to connect users with expert trainers, manage classes, book sessions, and engage in a supportive fitness community.

features.text: Secure login with role-based access (Admin, Trainer, Member)
Trainer listings, class bookings, Stripe payments
Community forum with voting, badges, and reviews
Dashboards for managing classes, trainers, and finances

title: SpeakFlow
description: SpeakFlow is an interactive blogging platform where users can write blogs, save their favorites, filter content, and leave comments.
challenges: Ensuring fast response times for filtering and searching from the database
Securing Firebase Authentication and Express API
futurePlans: Premium membership system with exclusive perks

title: Plant Care Tracker
description: PlantWarden is a beautiful application to manage your plant collection with watering reminders, care tips, and plant health tracking.
challenges: Managing accurate timing for plant watering reminders
Keeping the UI simple and fast-loading
